mapper.select: SELECT WA.WISH_NUMBER,WA.WISH_TITLE,WA.USER_ID,WA.APPLY_STATUS FROM SELLER S JOIN ( SELECT W.WISH_NUMBER,W.USER_ID,W.WISH_TITLE,A.APPLY_STATUS FROM WISH W JOIN APPLY_STATUS A ON W.WISH_NUMBER = A.WISH_NUMBER WHERE A.APPLY_STATUS=0) AS WA WHERE WA.WISH_TITLE LIKE CONCAT(S.SELLER_AREA,'%') AND S.USER_ID=#{user_id} GROUP BY WA.WISH_NUMBER
